Title: Green Street Hooligans
Writer: Lexi Alexander (story), Dougie Brimson (story), Dougie Brimson (screenplay), Josh Shelov (screenplay), Lexi Alexander (screenplay)
Actors: Elijah Wood, Charlie Hunnam, Claire Forlani, Marc Warren
Plot: A wrongfully expelled Harvard undergrad moves to London, where he is introduced to the violent underworld of football hooliganism.
